The woman was a maid, who was waiting for the master of the house to come out. Adolf, his granddaughter, and the maid walked into a house. The house belonged to a wealthy merchant. When Adolf and Nestor went into the kitchen, they saw a woman cooking dinner. At the dinner table, Adolf looked up at the ceiling. He turned and saw the dark face of his granddaughter. He was horrified. He ran out of the room and locked the door.
Tom decided to go to the park. He started to feel sick. He had to go for a few months. Eventually he got a lot of fun. Tom lost his job.
Tim was overweight. He decided to start exercising. He started to lose weight. He exercised. He lost weight.
